database.name: VIEW C_PROJECT_DETAILS_VT
database.view: SELECT pl.ad_client_id, pl.ad_org_id, pl.isactive, pl.created, pl.createdby, pl.updated, pl.updatedby, to_char('en_US') AS ad_language, pj.c_project_id, pl.c_projectline_id, pl.line, pl.plannedqty, pl.plannedprice, pl.plannedamt, pl.plannedmarginamt, pl.committedamt, pl.m_product_id, COALESCE(p.name, pl.description) AS name, CASE WHEN p.name IS NOT NULL THEN pl.description ELSE NULL END AS description, p.documentnote, p.upc, p.sku, p.value AS productvalue, pl.m_product_category_id, pl.invoicedamt, pl.invoicedqty, pl.committedqty FROM c_projectline pl JOIN c_project pj ON pl.c_project_id = pj.c_project_id LEFT JOIN m_product p ON pl.m_product_id = p.m_product_id WHERE pl.isprinted = 'Y'
